// src/i18n.js
import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';const resources={en:{translation:{"home":"Home","login":"Login","search":"Search","topMovies":"Top 10 movies on IMDb clone this week","noMovies":"No movies to display.","watchTrailer":"Watch Trailer","register":"Register","searchResultsFor":"Search Results for "}},tr:{translation:{"home":"Ana Sayfa","login":"Giriş","search":"Arama","topMovies":"Bu hafta IMDb klonunda en iyi 10 film","noMovies":"Gösterilecek film yok.","watchTrailer":"Fragmanı İzle","register":"Kaydol","searchResultsFor":"Search Results for "}}};i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources,lng:navigator.language.startsWith('tr')?'tr':'en',fallbackLng:'en',interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
